name: Tales of Phantasia: Narikiri Dungeon X
name_original: Tales of Phantasia: Narikiri Dungeon X
description:
Tales of Phantasia: Narikiri Dungeon X (テイルズ オブ ファンタジア なりきりダンジョンＸ) is a RPG video game published by Bandai Namco Games released on August 5th, 2010 for the PlayStation Portable.
A Sequel to the Legendary RPG, "Tales of Phantasia" released in 1995.
